subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text: {{ja-kanji|grade=1|rs=木00}}

subSections.title: Readings
Etymology 1
Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|き|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}
* {{a|Osaka}} {{ja-accent-common|heiban|き|い}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|き}}

# a [[tree]]; a [[shrub]]
# [[wood]], [[timber]], [[lumber]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=き|graph theory|computer science}} a [[tree]] (data structure)

subSections.title: Idioms
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|猿も木から落ちる|さる も き から おちる}}: “even monkeys fall from trees”, i.e. even experts make mistakes

subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|け}}

From {{inh|ja|ojp|木|tr=ke<sub>2</sub>}} (cf. phonetic Man'yōgana form {{ltc-l|氣}}). Possibly an intermediate form. Obsolete in modern {{etyl|ja|-}}, and never found in isolation; remains in certain place names. Even in ancient times, its use was apparently limited to eastern dialects.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|け}}

subSections.title: Noun
Etymology 3
Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|こ}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|こ}}

# a [[tree]]

subSections.title: Derived terms
Etymology 4
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|もく}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=もく}} {{zh-l|木|tr=muwk}}. The [[呉音#Japanese|''goon'']] reading, so likely the original borrowing. Compare modern {{etyl|yue|-}} {{zh-l|木|tr=muk6}}.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=goon|もく|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|もく}}

# a [[tree]]
# short for {{ja-l|木曜日||Mokuyōbi}}: [[Thursday]]
#: When written in [[romaji]], often capitalized as {{ja-l|||Moku}}.
# [[wood]] [[grain]]
#: Often written {{ja-l|杢}}.

subSections.title: Derived terms
subSections.text:
{{der-top}}
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Etymology 5
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|ぼく}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=ほく'}} {{zh-l|木}}. The [[漢音#Japanese|''kan'on'']] reading, so likely a later borrowing. Compare literary {{etyl|nan|-}} {{zh-l|木|tr=[[bo̍k]]}}.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|ぼく|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

subSections.title: Adjective
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|ぼく}}

# a [[tree]]; more specifically, a [[living]] tree
# the [[bent]] and [[gnarl]]ed [[trunk]] or [[root]]s of an old tree
# [[wood]], [[lumber]]
# something made of [[wood]]
# in ancient China, a [[wooden]] [[musical]] [[instrument]]

subSections.title: Derived terms
subSections.text:
{{der-top}}
{{der-bottom}}
